name: contract-notification-app
description: Key features of this project: * This project will allow user to login and register to contract-notification-app. * User can add new contract, edit contract and upload contract pdf. * User will receive timely notification if their contract is about to expire. * This project uses docker for smooth deployment, Amazon RDS as DB, Express.js, AWS SNS & SQS for notications, AWS Lambda function, AWS S3 for file storage and cron jobs.
